message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm asking for $20,000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects its worth.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $20,000 is a bit higher than I'm willing to pay right now.  Given my budget, I'm able to offer $16,000.  I believe this is a fair price, and I'm eager to work with you on this deal.
Hi Bob, thanks for your interest and your offer. I understand your position, but I can't sell it for less than $18,000. It's a very competitive price for a product of this quality.

Alice, I'm still interested, but $18,000 is still a bit high for me.  Would you be willing to come down to $17,000?  This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product, and I'm confident we can reach an agreement.
